Protocols/BTThreeDSecureRequestDelegate..name: onLookupComplete(_:lookupResult:next:)
Protocols/BTThreeDSecureRequestDelegate..abstract: Required delegate method which returns the ThreeDSecure lookup result before the flow continues.

Protocols/BTLocalPaymentRequestDelegate..name: localPaymentStarted(_:paymentID:start:)
Protocols/BTLocalPaymentRequestDelegate..abstract: Required delegate method which returns the payment ID before the flow starts.

Enums/BTVenmoPaymentMethodUsage.html#/c:.name: multiUse
Enums/BTVenmoPaymentMethodUsage.html#/c:.abstract: The Venmo payment will be authorized for future payments and can be vaulted.

Enums/BTVenmoPaymentMethodUsage.html#/c:.name: singleUse
Enums/BTVenmoPaymentMethodUsage.html#/c:.abstract: The Venmo payment will be authorized for a one-time payment and cannot be vaulted.

Enums/BTSEPADirectDebitMandateType.html.name: BTSEPADirectDebitMandateType
Enums/BTSEPADirectDebitMandateType.html.abstract: Mandate type for the SEPA Direct Debit request.

Enums/BTThreeDSecureV2ButtonType.html.name: BTThreeDSecureV2ButtonType
Enums/BTThreeDSecureV2ButtonType.html.abstract: Button types that can be customized in 3D Secure 2 flows.

Enums/BTPayPalRequestUserAction.html.name: BTPayPalRequestUserAction
Enums/BTPayPalRequestUserAction.html.abstract: The call-to-action in the PayPal Checkout flow.

Enums/BTPayPalLineItemKind.html.name: BTPayPalLineItemKind
Enums/BTPayPalLineItemKind.html.abstract: Use this option to specify whether a line item is a debit (sale) or credit (refund) to the customer.

Enums/BTPayPalLocaleCode.html.name: BTPayPalLocaleCode
Enums/BTPayPalLocaleCode.html.abstract: A locale code to use for a transaction.

Enums/BTPayPalRequestLandingPageType.htm.name: BTPayPalRequestLandingPageType
Enums/BTPayPalRequestLandingPageType.htm.abstract: Use this option to specify the PayPal page to display when a user lands on the PayPal site to complete the payment.

Enums/BTVenmoLineItemKind.html.name: BTVenmoLineItemKind
Enums/BTVenmoLineItemKind.html.abstract: Use this option to specify whether a line item is a debit (sale) or credit (refund) to the customer.

Enums/BTVenmoPaymentMethodUsage.html.name: BTVenmoPaymentMethodUsage
Enums/BTVenmoPaymentMethodUsage.html.abstract: Usage type for the tokenized Venmo account

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: profileID
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Optional. The Venmo profile ID to be used during payment authorization. Customers will see the business name and logo associated with this Venmo profile, and it may show up in the

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: vault
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Whether to automatically vault the Venmo account on the client. For client-side vaulting, you must initialize BTAPIClient with a client token that was created with a customer ID.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: paymentMethodUsage
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: If set to .multiUse, the Venmo payment will be authorized for future payments and can be vaulted.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: displayName
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Optional. The business name that will be displayed in the Venmo app payment approval screen. Only used by merchants onboarded as PayFast channel partners.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: collectCustomerBillingAddress
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Whether the customer’s billing address should be collected and displayed on the Venmo paysheet.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: collectCustomerShippingAddress
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Whether the customer’s shipping address should be collected and displayed on the Venmo paysheet.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: subTotalAmount
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Optional. The subtotal amount of the transaction to be displayed on the paysheet. Excludes taxes, discounts, and shipping amounts.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: discountAmount
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Optional. The total discount amount applied on the transaction to be displayed on the paysheet.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: taxAmount
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Optional. The total tax amount for the transaction to be displayed on the paysheet.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: shippingAmount
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Optional. The shipping amount for the transaction to be displayed on the paysheet.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: totalAmount
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Optional. The grand total amount on the transaction that should be displayed on the paysheet.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.name: lineItems
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Optional. The line items for this transaction. It can include up to 249 line items.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Initialize a Venmo request with a payment method usage.

Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: quantity
Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brain.abstract: Number of units of the item purchased. This value must be a whole number and can’t be negative or zero.

Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: unitAmount
Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brain.abstract: Per-unit price of the item. Can include up to 2 decimal places. This value can’t be negative or zero.

Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: kind
Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brain.abstract: Indicates whether the line item is a debit (sale) or credit (refund) to the customer.

Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: unitTaxAmount
Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brain.abstract: Optional: Per-unit tax price of the item. Can include up to 2 decimal places. This value can’t be negative or zero.

Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: productCode
Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brain.abstract: Optional: Product or UPC code for the item. Maximum 127 characters.

Classes/BTVenmoClient.html#/c:@M@Braintr.abstract: Initiates Venmo login via app switch, which returns a BTVenmoAccountNonce when successful.

Classes/BTVenmoClient.html#/s:14Braintre.abstract: Initiates Venmo login via app switch, which returns a BTVenmoAccountNonce when successful.

Classes/BTVenmoClient.html#/c:@M@Braintr.abstract: Switches to the App Store to download the Venmo application.

Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: isShippingAddressRequired

Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.abstract: Defaults to false. Set to true to enable user editing of the shipping address.

Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: localeCode
Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.abstract: Optional: A locale code to use for the transaction.

Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: shippingAddressOverride

Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: displayName
Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.abstract: Optional: The merchant name displayed inside of the PayPal flow; defaults to the company name on your Braintree account

Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: merchantAccountID
Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.abstract: Optional: A non-default merchant account to use for tokenization.

Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: lineItems

Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.name: riskCorrelationID
Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html#/c:@M@Brain.abstract: Optional: A risk correlation ID created with Set Transaction Context on your server.

Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brai.name: quantity
Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brai.abstract: Number of units of the item purchased. This value must be a whole number and can’t be negative or zero.

Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brai.name: unitAmount
Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brai.abstract: Per-unit price of the item. Can include up to 2 decimal places. This value can’t be negative or zero.

Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brai.name: kind
Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brai.abstract: Indicates whether the line item is a debit (sale) or credit (refund) to the customer.

Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brai.name: unitTaxAmount
Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brai.abstract: Optional: Per-unit tax price of the item. Can include up to 2 decimal places. This value can’t be negative or zero.

Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brai.name: productCode
Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html#/c:@M@Brai.abstract: Optional: Product or UPC code for the item. Maximum 127 characters.

Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancingAmount.ht.name: currency
Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancingAmount.ht.abstract: 3 letter currency code as defined by ISO 4217.

Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancingAmount.ht.name: value
Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancingAmount.ht.abstract: An amount defined by ISO 4217 for the given currency.

Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html#/c:.name: cardAmountImmutable
Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html#/c:.abstract: Indicates whether the card amount is editable after payer’s acceptance on PayPal side.

Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html#/c:.name: monthlyPayment
Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html#/c:.abstract: Estimated amount per month that the customer will need to pay including fees and interest.

Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html#/c:.name: payerAcceptance
Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html#/c:.abstract: Status of whether the customer ultimately was approved for and chose to make the payment using the approved installment credit.

Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html#/c:.name: totalCost
Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html#/c:.abstract: Estimated total payment amount including interest and fees the user will pay during the lifetime of the loan.

Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html#/c:.name: totalInterest
Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html#/c:.abstract: Estimated interest or fees amount the payer will have to pay during the lifetime of the loan.

Classes/BTPayPalClient.html#/c:@M@Braint.abstract: Tokenize a PayPal request to be used with the PayPal Vault flow.

Classes/BTPayPalClient.html#/s:15Braintr.abstract: Tokenize a PayPal request to be used with the PayPal Vault flow.

Classes/BTPayPalClient.html#/s:15Braintr.name: tokenize(_:)
Classes/BTPayPalClient.html#/s:15Braintr.abstract: Tokenize a PayPal request to be used with the PayPal Checkout or Pay Later flow.

Classes/BTPayPalCheckoutRequest.html#/c:.name: intent
Classes/BTPayPalCheckoutRequest.html#/c:.abstract: Optional: Payment intent. Defaults to .authorize. Only applies to PayPal Checkout.

Classes/BTPayPalCheckoutRequest.html#/c:.name: userAction
Classes/BTPayPalCheckoutRequest.html#/c:.abstract: Optional: Changes the call-to-action in the PayPal Checkout flow. Defaults to .none.

Classes/BTPayPalCheckoutRequest.html#/c:.name: offerPayLater
Classes/BTPayPalCheckoutRequest.html#/c:.abstract: Optional: Offers PayPal Pay Later if the customer qualifies. Defaults to false. Only available with PayPal Checkout.

Classes/BTPayPalCheckoutRequest.html#/c:.name: currencyCode
Classes/BTPayPalCheckoutRequest.html#/c:.abstract: Optional: A three-character ISO-4217 ISO currency code to use for the transaction. Defaults to merchant currency code if not set.

Classes/BTPayPalCheckoutRequest.html#/c:.name: requestBillingAgreement
Classes/BTPayPalCheckoutRequest.html#/c:.abstract: Optional: If set to true, this enables the Checkout with Vault flow, where the customer will be prompted to consent to a billing agreement during checkout. Defaults to false.

Classes/BTPayPalAccountNonce.html#/c:@M@.name: clientMetadataID
Classes/BTPayPalAccountNonce.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Client metadata id associated with this transaction.

Classes/BTPayPalAccountNonce.html#/c:@M@.name: payerID
Classes/BTPayPalAccountNonce.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Optional. Payer id associated with this transaction.

Classes/BTPayPalAccountNonce.html#/c:@M@.name: creditFinancing
Classes/BTPayPalAccountNonce.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Optional. Credit financing details if the customer pays with PayPal Credit.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: acsTransactionID
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: Unique transaction identifier assigned by the Access Control Server (ACS) to identify a single transaction.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: authenticationTransactionStatus
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: On authentication, the transaction status result identifier.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: authenticationTransactionStatusReason
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: On authentication, provides additional information as to why the transaction status has the specific value.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: cavv
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: Cardholder authentication verification value or “CAVV” is the main encrypted message issuers and card networks use to verify authentication has occured.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: dsTransactionID
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: Directory Server Transaction ID is an ID used by the card brand’s 3DS directory server.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: eciFlag
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: The ecommerce indicator flag indicates the outcome of the 3DS authentication.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: enrolled
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: Indicates whether a card is enrolled in a 3D Secure program or not. Possible values:

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: liabilityShifted
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: If the 3D Secure liability shift has occurred.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: liabilityShiftPossible
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: If the 3D Secure liability shift is possible.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: lookupTransactionStatus
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: On lookup, the transaction status result identifier.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: lookupTransactionStatusReason
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: On lookup, provides additional information as to why the transaction status has the specific value.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: paresStatus
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: The Payer Authentication Response (PARes) Status, a transaction status result identifier. Possible Values:

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: threeDSecureAuthenticationID
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: Unique identifier assigned to the 3D Secure authentication performed for this transaction.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: threeDSecureServerTransactionID
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: Unique transaction identifier assigned by the 3DS Server to identify a single transaction.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: threeDSecureVersion
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: The 3DS version used in the authentication, example “1.0.2” or “2.1.0”.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: wasVerified
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: Indicates if the 3D Secure lookup was performed.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.name: xid
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html#/c:@M@Br.abstract: Transaction identifier resulting from 3D Secure authentication. Uniquely identifies the transaction and sometimes required in the authorization message.

Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.name: expirationMonth
Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.abstract: The expiration month of the card, if available.

Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.name: expirationYear
Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.abstract: The expiration year of the card, if available.

Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.name: cardholderName
Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.abstract: The name of the cardholder, if available.

Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.name: lastTwo
Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.abstract: The last two digits of the card, if available.

Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.name: lastFour
Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.abstract: The last four digits of the card, if available.

Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.name: bin
Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.abstract: The BIN number of the card, if available.

Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.name: binData
Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.abstract: The BIN data for the card number associated with this nonce.

Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.name: threeDSecureInfo
Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.abstract: The 3D Secure info for the card number associated with this nonce.

Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.name: authenticationInsight
Classes/BTCardNonce.html#/c:@M@Braintree.abstract: Details about the regulatory environment and applicable customer authentication regulation for a potential transaction.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: number
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: The card number

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: expirationMonth
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: The expiration month as a one or two-digit number on the Gregorian calendar

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: expirationYear
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: The expiration year as a two or four-digit number on the Gregorian calendar

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: cvv
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: The card verification code (like CVV or CID).

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: postalCode
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: The postal code associated with the card’s billing address

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: cardholderName
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: the cardholder’s name.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: firstName
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: first name on the card.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: lastName
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: last name on the card.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: company
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: company name associated with the card.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: streetAddress
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: the street address associated with the card’s billing address

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: extendedAddress
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: the extended address associated with the card’s billing address

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: locality
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: the city associated with the card’s billing address

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: region
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: either a two-letter state code (for the US), or an ISO-3166-2 country subdivision code of up to three letters.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: countryName
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: the country name associated with the card’s billing address.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: countryCodeAlpha2
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code specified in the card’s billing address.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: countryCodeAlpha3
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: the ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code specified in the card’s billing address.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: countryCodeNumeric
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: The ISO 3166-1 numeric country code specified in the card’s billing address.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: shouldValidate
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Controls whether or not to return validations and/or verification results. By default, this is not enabled.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: authenticationInsightRequested
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: If authentication insight is requested. If this property is set to true, a merchantAccountID must be provided. Defaults to false.

Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.name: merchantAccountID
Classes/BTCard.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCard@.abstract: Optional: The merchant account ID.

Classes/BTAuthenticationInsight.html#/c:.name: regulationEnvironment
Classes/BTAuthenticationInsight.html#/c:.abstract: The regulation environment for the associated nonce to help determine the need for 3D Secure.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2UICustomization..name: textBoxCustomization
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2UICustomization..abstract: Text box customization options for 3D Secure 2 flows.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2UICustomization..name: setButton(_:buttonType:)
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2UICustomization..abstract: Set button customization options for 3D Secure 2 flows.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2ToolbarCustomiza.name: backgroundColor
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2ToolbarCustomiza.abstract: Color code in Hex format. For example, the color code can be #999999.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2ToolbarCustomiza.name: buttonText
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2ToolbarCustomiza.abstract: Text for the button. For example, Cancel.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2TextBoxCustomiza.name: borderWidth
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2TextBoxCustomiza.abstract: Width (integer value) of the text box border.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2TextBoxCustomiza.name: borderColor
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2TextBoxCustomiza.abstract: Color code in Hex format. For example, the color code can be #999999.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2TextBoxCustomiza.name: cornerRadius
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2TextBoxCustomiza.abstract: Radius (integer value) for the text box corners.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2LabelCustomizati.name: headingTextColor
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2LabelCustomizati.abstract: Color code in Hex format. For example, the color code can be #999999.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2LabelCustomizati.name: headingTextFontName
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2LabelCustomizati.abstract: Font type for the heading label text.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2LabelCustomizati.name: headingTextFontSize
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2LabelCustomizati.abstract: Font size for the heading label text.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2ButtonCustomizat.name: backgroundColor
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2ButtonCustomizat.abstract: Color code in Hex format. For example, the color code can be #999999.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2BaseCustomizatio.name: textColor
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2BaseCustomizatio.abstract: Color code in Hex format. For example, the color code can be #999999.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureResult.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The result of a 3D Secure lookup. Contains liability shift and challenge information.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureResult.html#/c:@M@.name: errorMessage
Classes/BTThreeDSecureResult.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The error message when the 3D Secure flow is unsuccessful

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: nonce
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: A nonce to be verified by ThreeDSecure

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: accountType
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional. The account type selected by the cardholder

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: billingAddress
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional. The billing address used for verification

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: mobilePhoneNumber
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional. The mobile phone number used for verification

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: shippingMethod
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional. The shipping method chosen for the transaction

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: additionalInformation
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional. The additional information used for verification

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: challengeRequested
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional. If set to true, an authentication challenge will be forced if possible.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: exemptionRequested
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional. If set to true, an exemption to the authentication challenge will be requested.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: requestedExemptionType
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional. The exemption type to be requested. If an exemption is requested and the exemption’s conditions are satisfied, then it will be applied.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: dataOnlyRequested
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional. Indicates whether to use the data only flow. In this flow, frictionless 3DS is ensured for Mastercard cardholders as the card scheme provides a risk score

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: cardAddChallenge
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional. An authentication created using this property should only be used for adding a payment method to the merchant’s vault and not for creating transactions.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.name: threeDSecureRequestDelegate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: A delegate for receiving information about the ThreeDSecure payment flow.

Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.name: givenName
Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.abstract: Optional. Given name associated with the address

Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.name: streetAddress
Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.abstract: Optional. Line 1 of the Address (eg. number, street, etc)

Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.name: extendedAddress
Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.abstract: Optional. Line 2 of the Address (eg. suite, apt #, etc.)

Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.name: line3
Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.abstract: Optional. Line 3 of the Address (eg. suite, apt #, etc.)

Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.name: region
Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.abstract: Optional. Either a two-letter state code (for the US), or an ISO-3166-2 country subdivision code of up to three letters.

Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.name: postalCode
Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.abstract: Optional. Zip code or equivalent is usually required for countries that have them.

Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.name: phoneNumber
Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.abstract: Optional. The phone number associated with the address

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.name: paReq
Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The “PAReq” or “Payment Authentication Request” is the encoded request message used to initiate authentication.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.name: md
Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The unique 3DS identifier assigned by Braintree to track the 3DS call as it progresses.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.name: acsURL

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.name: termURL
Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The termURL is the fully qualified URL that the customer will be redirected to once the authentication completes.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.name: threeDSecureVersion
Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The full version string of the 3DS lookup result.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.name: transactionID
Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:@M@.abstract: This a secondary unique 3DS identifier assigned by Braintree to track the 3DS call as it progresses.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: shippingAddress
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The shipping address used for verification

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: shippingMethodIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit string indicating the shipping method chosen for the transaction

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: productCode
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 3-letter string representing the merchant product code

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: deliveryTimeframe
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit number indicating the delivery timeframe

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: deliveryEmail
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. For electronic delivery, email address to which the merchandise was delivered

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: reorderIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit number indicating whether the cardholder is reordering previously purchased merchandise

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: preorderIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit number indicating whether the cardholder is placing an order with a future availability or release date

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: preorderDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating expected date that a pre-ordered purchase will be available

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: giftCardAmount
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The purchase amount total for prepaid gift cards in major units

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: giftCardCurrencyCode
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. ISO 4217 currency code for the gift card purchased

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: giftCardCount
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Total count of individual prepaid gift cards purchased

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountAgeIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value representing the length of time since the last change to the cardholder account. This includes shipping address, new payment account or new user added.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountCreateDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date the cardholder’s account was last changed.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountChangeIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value representing the length of time since the last change to the cardholder account. This includes shipping address, new payment account or new user added.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountChangeDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date the cardholder’s account was last changed.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountPwdChangeIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value representing the length of time since the cardholder changed or reset the password on the account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountPwdChangeDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date the cardholder last changed or reset password on account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: shippingAddressUsageIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value indicating when the shipping address used for transaction was first used.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: shippingAddressUsageDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date when the shipping address used for this transaction was first used.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: transactionCountDay
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Number of transactions (successful or abandoned) for this cardholder account within the last 24 hours.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: transactionCountYear
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Number of transactions (successful or abandoned) for this cardholder account within the last year.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: addCardAttempts
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Number of add card attempts in the last 24 hours.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountPurchases
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Number of purchases with this cardholder account during the previous six months.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: fraudActivity
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value indicating whether the merchant experienced suspicious activity (including previous fraud) on the account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: shippingNameIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value indicating if the cardholder name on the account is identical to the shipping name used for the transaction.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: paymentAccountIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value indicating the length of time that the payment account was enrolled in the merchant account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: paymentAccountAge
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date the payment account was added to the cardholder account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: addressMatch
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 1-character value (Y/N) indicating whether cardholder billing and shipping addresses match.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountID
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Additional cardholder account information.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: ipAddress
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The IP address of the consumer. IPv4 and IPv6 are supported.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: orderDescription
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Brief description of items purchased.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: taxAmount
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Unformatted tax amount without any decimalization (ie. $123.67 = 12367).

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: userAgent
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The exact content of the HTTP user agent header.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: authenticationIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit number indicating the type of authentication request.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: installment
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. An integer value greater than 1 indicating the maximum number of permitted authorizations for installment payments.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: purchaseDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 14-digit number (format: YYYYMMDDHHMMSS) indicating the date in UTC of original purchase.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: recurringEnd
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date after which no further recurring authorizations should be performed.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: recurringFrequency
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Integer value indicating the minimum number of days between recurring authorizations.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: sdkMaxTimeout
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit number of minutes (minimum 05) to set the maximum amount of time for all 3DS 2.0 messages to be communicated between all components.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: workPhoneNumber
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The work phone number used for verification. Only numbers; remove dashes, parenthesis and other characters.

Classes/BTLocalPaymentResult.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Client Metadata ID associated with this transaction.

Classes/BTLocalPaymentRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: The country code of the local payment.

Classes/BTLocalPaymentRequest.html#/c:@M.name: merchantAccountID

Classes/BTLocalPaymentRequest.html#/c:@M.name: currencyCode
Classes/BTLocalPaymentRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional: A valid ISO currency code to use for the transaction. Defaults to merchant currency code if not set.

Classes/BTLocalPaymentRequest.html#/c:@M.name: displayName

Classes/BTLocalPaymentRequest.html#/c:@M.name: isShippingAddressRequired
Classes/BTLocalPaymentRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Indicates whether or not the payment needs to be shipped. For digital goods, this should be false. Defaults to false.

Classes/BTLocalPaymentRequest.html#/c:@M.abstract: Optional: Bank Identification Code of the customer (specific to iDEAL transactions).

Classes/BTBinData.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCo.name: prepaid

Classes/BTBinData.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCo.name: healthcare
Classes/BTBinData.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCo.abstract: Whether the card is a healthcare card. Possible values: Yes/No/Unknown

Classes/BTBinData.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCo.name: debit
Classes/BTBinData.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCo.abstract: Whether the card is a debit card. Possible values: Yes/No/Unknown

Classes/BTBinData.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCo.name: durbinRegulated

Classes/BTBinData.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCo.name: commercial

Classes/BTBinData.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCo.name: payroll

Classes/BTBinData.html#/c:@M@BraintreeCo.name: countryOfIssuance

Classes/BTBinData.html.name: BTBinData
Classes/BTBinData.html.abstract: Contains the bin data associated with a payment method

Classes/BTClientToken.html.name: BTClientToken
Classes/BTClientToken.html.abstract: An authorization string used to initialize the Braintree SDK

Classes/BTPaymentMethodNonce.html.name: BTPaymentMethodNonce
Classes/BTPaymentMethodNonce.html.abstract: BTPaymentMethodNonce is for generic tokenized payment information.

Classes/BTPaymentMethodNonceParser.html.name: BTPaymentMethodNonceParser
Classes/BTPaymentMethodNonceParser.html.abstract: A JSON parser that parses BTJSON into concrete BTPaymentMethodNonce objects. It supports registration of parsers at runtime.

Classes/BTPayPalNativeCheckoutAccountNon.name: BTPayPalNativeCheckoutAccountNonce
Classes/BTPayPalNativeCheckoutAccountNon.abstract: Contains information about a PayPal payment method.

Classes/BTPayPalNativeCheckoutClient.htm.name: BTPayPalNativeCheckoutClient
Classes/BTPayPalNativeCheckoutClient.htm.abstract: Client used to collect PayPal payment methods. If possible, this client will present a native flow; otherwise, it will fall back to a web flow.

Classes/BTSEPADirectDebitClient.html.name: BTSEPADirectDebitClient
Classes/BTSEPADirectDebitClient.html.abstract: Used to integrate with SEPA Direct Debit.

Classes/BTSEPADirectDebitNonce.html.name: BTSEPADirectDebitNonce
Classes/BTSEPADirectDebitNonce.html.abstract: A payment method nonce representing a SEPA Direct Debit payment.

Classes/BTSEPADirectDebitRequest.html.name: BTSEPADirectDebitRequest
Classes/BTSEPADirectDebitRequest.html.abstract: Parameters for creating a SEPA Direct Debit tokenization request.

Classes/BTAmericanExpressClient.html.name: BTAmericanExpressClient
Classes/BTAmericanExpressClient.html.abstract: BTAmericanExpressClient enables you to look up the rewards balance of American Express cards.

Classes/BTAmericanExpressRewardsBalance..name: BTAmericanExpressRewardsBalance
Classes/BTAmericanExpressRewardsBalance..abstract: Contains information about an American Express rewards balance.

Classes/BTApplePayCardNonce.html.name: BTApplePayCardNonce
Classes/BTApplePayCardNonce.html.abstract: Contains information about a tokenized Apple Pay card.

Classes/BTLocalPaymentRequest.html.name: BTLocalPaymentRequest
Classes/BTLocalPaymentRequest.html.abstract: Used to initialize a local payment flow

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformation
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Additional information for a 3DS lookup. Used in 3DS 2.0+ flows.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html.name: BTThreeDSecureRequest
Classes/BTThreeDSecureRequest.html.abstract: Used to initialize a 3D Secure payment flow

Classes/BTThreeDSecureResult.html.name: BTThreeDSecureResult
Classes/BTThreeDSecureResult.html.abstract: The result of a 3D Secure payment flow

Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2TextBoxCustomiza.name: BTThreeDSecureV2TextBoxCustomization
Classes/BTThreeDSecureV2TextBoxCustomiza.abstract: Text box customization options for 3D Secure 2 flows.

Classes/BTAuthenticationInsight.html.name: BTAuthenticationInsight
Classes/BTAuthenticationInsight.html.abstract: Information pertaining to the regulatory environment for a credit card if authentication insight is requested during tokenization.

Classes/BTCard.html.name: BTCard
Classes/BTCard.html.abstract: The card tokenization request represents raw credit or debit card data provided by the customer.

Classes/BTCardRequest.html.name: BTCardRequest
Classes/BTCardRequest.html.abstract: Contains information about a card to tokenize

Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html.name: BTThreeDSecureInfo
Classes/BTThreeDSecureInfo.html.abstract: Contains information about the 3D Secure status of a payment method

Classes/BTPayPalAccountNonce.html.name: BTPayPalAccountNonce
Classes/BTPayPalAccountNonce.html.abstract: Contains information about a PayPal payment method

Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html.name: BTPayPalCreditFinancing
Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancing.html.abstract: Contains information about a PayPal credit financing option

Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancingAmount.ht.name: BTPayPalCreditFinancingAmount
Classes/BTPayPalCreditFinancingAmount.ht.abstract: Contains information about a PayPal credit amount

Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html.name: BTPayPalLineItem
Classes/BTPayPalLineItem.html.abstract: A PayPal line item to be displayed in the PayPal checkout flow.

Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html.name: BTPayPalRequest
Classes/BTPayPalRequest.html.abstract: Base options for PayPal Checkout and PayPal Vault flows.

Classes/BTVenmoAccountNonce.html.name: BTVenmoAccountNonce
Classes/BTVenmoAccountNonce.html.abstract: Contains information about a Venmo Account payment method

Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html.name: BTVenmoLineItem
Classes/BTVenmoLineItem.html.abstract: A Venmo line item to be displayed in the Venmo Paysheet.

Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html.name: BTVenmoRequest
Classes/BTVenmoRequest.html.abstract: A BTVenmoRequest specifies options that contribute to the Venmo flow
